key_items: The presence of the "man" directly supports the option as he is the performer of the actions. Removing the man would negate the possibility of any actions being performed,thus changing the conclusion. The "sheep" indicates the first animal action being imitated,supporting the count of distinct actions. Removing the sheep would remove the first action from consideration,affecting the total count and thus the conclusion.
